content: SINGAPORE  Oct 1 Singapore sovereign wealth fund GIC said it had formed a joint venture with mall operator Macerich Co to buy a 40 percent stake in five retail assets in the United States.

title: GIC forms JV with Macerich to invest in five U.S. retail assets

content: NEW YORK  June 19 Shares of mall operator Macerich Co fell as much as 7.3 percent on Friday on reports rival Simon Property Group Inc was selling a 3.6 percent stake  months after its failed takeover bid.
name: Macerich Company (The)
title: UPDATE 1-Macerich shares slump on talk Simon selling its stake

content: May 4 U.S. mall owner Macerich Co plans to terminate its stockholder rights plan and add two new independent directors as part of a settlement with an activist investor group.
name: Macerich Company (The)
title: Macerich settles with investor group  to add two independent directors

content: April 30 Sears Holdings Corp and mall operator Macerich Co will form a joint venture  which will buy nine Sears properties in Macerich's malls for $150 million  in the retailer's third such deal this month.
name: Macerich Company (The)
title: Sears ties up with Macerich in third real estate joint venture

content: Macerich Co's  fourth largest shareholder  Cohen & Steers Inc   asked the shopping mall company on Wednesday to produce a plan that will deliver as much value as the takeover offer by Simon Property Group Inc  it turned down last month.
name: Macerich Company (The)
title: Exclusive: Top Macerich shareholder calls for plan after Simon snub

content: April 2 Activist investor Jonathan Litt has nominated four directors to Macerich Co's board after the U.S. mall owner rejected a takeover bid from larger rival Simon Property Group Inc  a person familiar with the situation said.

title: Activist investor nominates directors to Macerich board - source

content: April 2 Simon Property Group Inc  the largest U.S. shopping mall owner  said it would buy back $2 billion in stock  less than 48 hours after scrapping an attempt to buy rival Macerich Co.
name: Macerich Company (The)
title: Simon Property to buy back $2 bln in stock after Macerich snub

title: Simon's failed bid suggests REIT values still at a discount

content: NEW YORK  March 19 Whether a ploy to drive bidding higher or an effective roadblock  Macerich Co.'s  moves this week to ward off Simon Property Group Inc's  $14.39 billion hostile takeover gives the target company a stronger defense against a formidable adversary.

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  March 09 (Fitch) The proposal by Simon Property Group  Inc. (NYSE:  SPG) to acquire The Macerich Company (NYSE: MAC  Macerich) for $91.00 per share  in cash and SPG shares  if consummated as proposed  would likely have negative  credit implications for SPG according to Fitch Ratings. title: Fitch: Simon's Proposed Acquisition of Macerich Would Likely Have Negative Credit Implications

content: NEW YORK  March 10 People have been writing epitaphs for brick-and-mortar malls for years  but Simon Property Group Inc's unsolicited takeover bid for rival Macerich Co shows there is still plenty of interest in the limited supply of upscale shopping centers.
